mapper.sql: id, version, create_date, last_modify_date, permission_name, is_enable
mapper.select:
select
from permission where id = (select permission_id from role_permission where role_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.insert:
insert into permission
id,
version,
create_date,
last_modify_date,
permission_name,
is_enable,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update permission
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
permission_name = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update permission set version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, permission_name = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
